channel.title: blockchain on Eric Khun
channel.description: Recent content in blockchain on Eric Khun

item.title: Explaining blockchain to developers
item.description: Explaining Blockchain to a Developer “Hey Eric! Did you know you can make some “internet money” if you let this daemon run on your computer?” a workmate told me. I’ve assumed it could be a kind of spyware/adware showing me ads and didn’t consider the idea further. Few months later, in October 2016, An ex-classmate told me he made a good amount of money with that thing called “Ethereum”. I bought some Bitcoins and Ethereum after that via wechat.
